column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: There was traffic chaos this morning after several vehicles were involved in a crash.------The accident occurred around 8:30 am on November 16
column7: Chamkarmon district. ------Two injured were taken to The Bayon private hospital
column8: located near the Sky Bridge. ------After the incident
column9: the traffic police surveyed and helped traffic to avoid further congestion.------Rasmei News------ ------
